Package com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.fragments

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LiBrowseFragment.DepthChangeListener  
    LiOnMessageRowClickListener
    An interface for adding click and long click behaviors to a particular message from the list of messages displayed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LiBaseFragment
    This fragment is an abstract base class which takes care of getting appropriate LiClient, fetching data, setup the common views and a common error layout.
    LiBrowseFragment
    This fragment takes care of displaying the Categories, Subcategories and Boards present inside a Category or a Subcategor This extends LiBaseFragment for reusing the Common view like Error Layout, Login layout, etc.
    LiConversationFragment
    This fragment extends LiBaseFragment to display the conversation that is present in the community for a selected message Usage: Intent i = new Intent(context, LiConversationActivity.class); i.putExtra(LiSDKConstants.SELECTED_MESSAGE_ID, message.getId());
    LiCreateMessageFragment
    This fragment extends DialogFragment Has the responsibility for displayed the Message Authoring UI This fragment is also used for the displaying the Reply UI for a selected message.
    LiMessageListFragment
    This fragment represent a list Messages for a board or just the top messages in a community.
    LiSearchFragment
    This fragment extends LiBaseFragment and displays the Search results for a given keyword.
    LiUserActivityFragment
    This fragment extends LiBaseFragment and displays Messages that are authored by the logged in user.
